verses.roman:
se deśera rājā āila āścarya śuniñā
parama santoṣa pāila gopāle dekhiñā

synonyms: se deśera—of that country; rājā—the King; āila—came; āścarya—about the wonder; śuniñā—hearing; parama—great; santoṣa—satisfaction; pāila—achieved; gopāle—Gopāla; dekhiñā—by seeing.
translation: Eventually the King of that country heard of this wonderful story, and he also came to see Gopāla and thus became very satisfied.
